author: MSNBC.com
title: Experts say U.S. testing must double or triple to reopen safely
description: Dr. Richard Besser tells Ali Velshi that “more work needs to be done” on antibody testing to ensure that Americans are protected from the virus as he stresses the importance in ramping up testing and contact tracing to keep sick people isolated as states reop…
content: Dr. Richard Besser tells Ali Velshi that more work needs to be done on antibody testing to ensure that Americans are protected from the virus as he stresses the importance in ramping up testing and contact tracing to keep sick people isolated as states reopen… [+145 chars]
